# Check Pytorch installation
import torch, torchvision
print(torch.__version__, torch.cuda.is_available())

# Check MMDetection installation
import mmdet
print(mmdet.__version__)

# Check mmcv installation
from mmcv.ops import get_compiling_cuda_version, get_compiler_version
print(get_compiling_cuda_version())
print(get_compiler_version())
source.e487b03d:
def set_seed(seed=27):
    """Sets the random seeds."""
    random.seed(seed)
    np.random.seed(seed)
    torch.manual_seed(seed)
    torch.cuda.manual_seed(seed)
    torch.backends.cudnn.deterministic = True
    torch.backends.cudnn.benchmark = False
    os.environ['PYTHONHASHSEED'] = str(seed)
 
set_seed()
source.b9405e6c:
Due to the rapid development of mmdetection, official documentation and tutorials do not always have time to be updated. When you try to use mmdetection, you may encounter difficulties, which are most likely related to problems caused by incorrect library versions or their incorrect installation. 

I would like to Express my gratitude to the authors of this software. I hope that this pipeline will help you get started using this software faster and appreciate its full potential.
